locales.name: Скриване на Елементи Помагач за Adblock Plus
locales.description: Помага ви да създавате правила за Adblock Plus с които да скривате елементи от страниците, за борба с текстовите реклами.
locales.creator: Wladimir Palant

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper per Adblock Plus
locales.description: T'ajuda a crear normes d'omissió d'elements per l'AdBlock Plus per combatre els ads de text.

locales.name: Pomocník skrývání prvků pro Adblock Plus
locales.description: Pomáhá vám v boji proti textovým reklamám zjednodušením tvorby pravidel na skrývání prkvů pro Adblock Plus.

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper für Adblock Plus
locales.description: Hilft beim Erstellen von Regeln zum Verstecken von Elementen, um mit Adblock Plus Textwerbung zu bekämpfen.
locales.creator: Wladimir Palant

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper for Adblock Plus
locales.description: Pomaga wam, pšawidła za chowanje elementow za Adblock Plus napóraś, aby pśeśiwo tekstowemu wabjenjeju wójował.
locales.creator: Wladimir Palant

locales.name: Βοηθός Απόκρυψης Στοιχείων για το Adblock Plus
locales.description: Βοηθά στην δημιουργία κανόνων απόκρυψης στοιχείων για το Adblock Plus για να αντιμετωπίσετε τις διαφημίσεις κειμένου.
locales.creator: Wladimir Palant

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper for Adblock Plus

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper for Adblock Plus
locales.description: Helps you create element hiding rules for Adblock Plus to fight the text ads.

locales.name: Asistente ocultador de elementos para Adblock Plus
locales.description: Te ayuda a crear reglas para ocultar elementos, conjuntamente con Adblock Plus, para combatir las publicidades de texto.
locales.creator: Wladimir Palant

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper para Adblock Plus
locales.description: Le ayuda a crear reglas de ocultación de elementos para Adblock Plus contra la publicidad en forma de textos.
locales.creator: Wladimir Palant

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper para Adblock Plus
locales.description: Le ayuda a crear reglas para ocultar elementos no deseados para Adblock Plus para eliminar la publicidad en forma de textos.

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper for Adblock Plus
locales.description: Helps you create element hiding rules for Adblock Plus to fight the text ads.

locales.name: Elementuak Ezkutatzeko Adblock Plus Lagungarria
locales.description: Adblock Plus erabilita elementuak ezkutatzeko arauak sortzen laguntzen dizu, testu iragarkiak borrokatzeko.

locales.name: نرم افزار کمکی حذف تبلیغات برای Adblock Plus

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper pour Adblock Plus
locales.description: Vous aide à créer des règles de masquage d'éléments pour Adblock Plus, afin de lutter contre les textes publicitaires.

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper עבור Adblock Plus

locales.name: Pomoćnik sakrivanja elemenata za Adblock Plus

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper for Adblock Plus

locales.creator: Wladimir Palant

locales.name: Bantuan Penyembunyian Elemen untuk Adblock Plus

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper for Adblock Plus

locales.creator: Wladimir Palant

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper voor Adblock Plus

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper for Adblock Plus
locales.description: Ajuda a criar regras de ocultamento de elementos para o Adblock Plus para combater propagandas de texto.

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper para Adblock Plus
locales.description: Ajuda-o a criar regras de ocultação de elementos para o Adblock Plus para ocultar os anúncios de texto.

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper pentru Adblock Plus
locales.description: Vă ajută să creați reguli de ascundere a elementelor pentru Adblock Plus cu scopul de a bloca reclamele de tip text.

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper для Adblock Plus
locales.description: Помогает при создании правил скрытия для Adblock Plus, эффективное средство борьбы с текстовой рекламой.

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper pre Adblock Plus
locales.description: Pomôže vám s vytváraním pravidiel na skrývanie prvkov pre Adblock Plus a bojovať s textovými reklamami.

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper za Adblock Plus
locales.description: Vam pomaga ustvariti pravila za skrivanje tekstovnih oglasnih blokov z Adblock Plus vtičnikom.

locales.name: Ndihmues për Element i Fshehur për Adblock Plus

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper за Adblock Plus

locales.name: Element Hiding Helper для Adblock Plus

defaultLocale.name: Greasemonkey
defaultLocale.description: A User Script Manager for Firefox
defaultLocale.creator: Aaron Boodman; http://youngpup.net/

defaultLocale.name: FlashGot
defaultLocale.description: Enables Firefox, Mozilla Suite, Netscape and Thunderbird to handle single and massive ("all" and "selection") downloads using the most popular external download managers for Windows, Mac OS X, Linux and FreeBSD (dozens currently supported, see Extension's Home Page for details). FlashGot offers also a Build Gallery functionality which helps to synthetize full media galleries in one page, from serial contents originally scattered on several pages, for easy and fast "download all".
defaultLocale.creator: Giorgio Maone
contributors: Alexander "Hawksthorne" Kirilov and Kalin Takev  (Bulgarian translation)
Anthony L. Bryan and Darius Liktorius (Metalink support)
Artek Działek, Bartosz Piec and Piotr Konieczny (Polish translation)
Kozák Csaba (WonderCsabo), Bálint Farkas and Henriett Peller (Hungarian translation)
Bigbigbomb, Blackdire, Charlie Chen and George C. Tsoi (Simplified Chinese translation)
Diogo Mafra, Raryel Costa Souza and Marcelo Ghelman (Portuguese translation)
Emilio Malaman, Tulio Padilha and Pesty (Portuguese translation)
Jacques Letellier, Yann Bill and Calimero988 (French translation)
Kimmo Siekkinen and Jouko Saarinen (Finnish translation)
